Today in Caithness, it's a bit rough with 5 ft @6s S swell and fresh 34 mph SSW winds creating blown-out conditions. Tomorrow, things improve significantly with 7 ft @10s W swell and light 9 mph SSW winds, making for clean surf at spots like Point of Ness and Murkle Point. The day after, the swell drops to 5 ft @14s NW with moderate 11 mph WSW winds, still offering fun waves at the same spots. Best: tomorrow.
